law.catch_line: Creation And Priority Of Lien On Commercial Property Owned By Gaming Licensee In The Commonwealth
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2011, 194, Sec. 16 effective November 22, 2011.] Any liability to the commonwealth under this chapter shall constitute a debt to the commonwealth. Once a statement naming a gaming licensee is recorded, registered or filed, any such debt shall constitute a lien on all commercial property owned by a gaming licensee in the commonwealth and shall have priority over an encumbrance recorded, registered or filed with respect to any site.
